author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Mylapore All Women Police station has registered a case against a policeman, Arunan, attached to the armed unit of the city police on charges of polygamy.

According to sources, the case was registered against Arunan, a policeman, based on a complaint from his wives.

Arunan is said to be in Tiruchi and has not been coming to work. Further enquiries are on and the police are investigating.
title: Case against policeman
